lom:description.lom:string:
BEST convened the nations most respected practitioners, researchers and policymakers and identify whats working across the country to develop the technical talent of under-represented groups in higher education, and the workplace. This comprehensive assessment has never been attempted before. This is their third report with a focus on higher education, titled:
"?A Bridge for All: Higher Education Design Principles to Broaden Participation in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics?.

lom:title.lom:string: A Bridge for All: Higher Education Design Principles to Broaden Participation in Science, Technology, Engineering and Math
